languages.text: "Иокаста Зауэрбэк, я прощаю блюстителям небрежение, приведшее к измене на корабле. Вы достойно проявили себя".
"Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."
languages.original_text: "Иокаста Зауэрбэк, я прощаю блюстителям небрежение, приведшее к измене на корабле. Вы достойно проявили себя".

traits.locale_text: "Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."
"Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."

"Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."

languages.text: « Jocasta Sauerback, j'accorde mon pardon aux prévôts pour leur négligence, malgré la trahison qui s'en est ensuivie et le danger qu'a encouru le vaisseau. Vos hommes et vous avez fait vos preuves. »
languages.original_text: "Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."

traits.locale_text: « Jocasta Sauerback, j'accorde mon pardon aux prévôts pour leur négligence, malgré la trahison qui s'en est ensuivie et le danger qu'a encouru le vaisseau. Vos hommes et vous avez fait vos preuves. »

languages.text: «Jocasta Sauerback, absuelvo al personal de seguridad de la negligencia que ha dado lugar a traición y ha puesto en riesgo la nave. Usted y los suyos han demostrado su valía».
languages.original_text: "Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."

traits.locale_text: «Jocasta Sauerback, absuelvo al personal de seguridad de la negligencia que ha dado lugar a traición y ha puesto en riesgo la nave. Usted y los suyos han demostrado su valía».

languages.text: “约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克，你的执法者由于疏忽，导致这艘船的安全受到了威胁。尽管这理应视为叛国罪，但我赦免你们的罪过，你和你的人已经证明了你们的忠诚。”
languages.original_text: "Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."

traits.locale_text: “约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克，你的执法者由于疏忽，导致这艘船的安全受到了威胁。尽管这理应视为叛国罪，但我赦免你们的罪过，你和你的人已经证明了你们的忠诚。”

languages.text: 「ジョカスタ・ザウアーバック。船を危険にさらす反逆につながったエンフォーサーの怠慢を赦す。あなたと仲間達は、自分自身がどういう者か見せつけたのです」
languages.original_text: "Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."

traits.locale_text: 「ジョカスタ・ザウアーバック。船を危険にさらす反逆につながったエンフォーサーの怠慢を赦す。あなたと仲間達は、自分自身がどういう者か見せつけたのです」

languages.text: "Jocasta Sauerback, ich vergebe den Enforcers ihre Nachlässigkeit, die dazu geführt hat, dass das Schiff durch Hochverrat in Gefahr geraten ist. Ihr und Eure Leute, Ihr habt Euch bewiesen."
languages.original_text: "Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."

traits.locale_text: "Jocasta Sauerback, ich vergebe den Enforcers ihre Nachlässigkeit, die dazu geführt hat, dass das Schiff durch Hochverrat in Gefahr geraten ist. Ihr und Eure Leute, Ihr habt Euch bewiesen."

languages.text: "Jocasta Sauerback, ihanete yol açan ve gemiyi tehlikeye sokan ihmalkârlıklarından ötürü infazcıları affediyorum. Sen ve takipçilerin kendinizi kanıtladınız."
languages.original_text: "Jocasta Sauerback, I pardon the enforcers their negligence that led to treason endangering the ship. You and your people have proven yourselves."
